page.title: 14DAILY DIET -l985
page.content: BREAKFAST CHOICES DRINKS:Tea,coffee,milk,fruit juice FOOD:Toast,bacon,eggs,cereal:porridge oats,cornflakes. LUNCHEON CHOICES DRINKS:Tea,coffee,diluted drinks and fizzy drinks:lemonade,coke. FOOD:Soups,sandwiches,cheese,bread and pickles. DINNER CHOICES DRINKS:Same as lunch,occasional glass of wine. FOOD:Basic meals:Meat and vegetables: Fish,beef,pork,lamb,chicken Green vegetables,root vegetables and salad. SUPPER CHOICES DRINKS:Hot milk, hot chocolate,Horlicks FOOD:Toast and snacks or biscuits.
